name: preset

schema.title: Generator ran by create-nx-plugin
schema.description: Initializes a workspace with an nx-plugin inside of it. Use as: `create-nx-plugin` or `create-nx-workspace --preset @nrwl/nx-plugin`.

cliName.description: Name of cli command to create workspace with plugin

description: Initializes a workspace with an nx-plugin inside of it. Use as: `create-nx-workspace --preset @nrwl/nx-plugin`.
